about.title: About SlideMino
about.tagline: The Perfect Blend of 2048 and Tetris
about.description: SlideMino is an innovative browser-based puzzle game that combines the addictive number-merging mechanics of 2048 with strategic block placement of Tetris.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.tagline: We'd love to hear from you!
contact.description: Have questions, bug reports, or feedback? Feel free to reach out anytime!
